subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: The head of the Nevada boxing commission ordered Manny Pacquiao and Floyd Mayweather Jr. to submit to urine tests to break the impasse that has threatened to derail their proposed March 13 fight.
snippet: The head of the Nevada boxing commission ordered Manny Pacquiao and Floyd Mayweather Jr. to submit to urine tests to break the impasse that has threatened to derail their proposed March 13 fight.
